item.title: Life Lessons 101 - Memories
item.description: I always wondered what leads to those lifelong friendships ? The answer seems to lie in memories. The foundation for any good friendship/relationship is built by memories shared between people. The memory can be a fun one or a boring one, but spending time and making that memory is vital. A boring memory is better than no memory at all. Those shared memories create the bond and more memories leads to a stronger bond. The only catch is once you make them you can’t undo them. But that shouldn’t be the problem because, a boring memory is always better than no memory at all.
